test_frequency: Automated: Every CI build. Manual: Quarterly.
testing_tools: OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite, CodeQL, Trivy
test_scenarios: ["JWT Tampering","Session Hijacking via Stolen Tokens","Brute Force on Login/MFA","Token Blocklist Bypass","Account Enumeration","Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) on user resources"]
acceptance_criteria: Zero critical or high vulnerabilities in the authentication flows.
reporting_requirements: Vulnerability report with CVSS scores for each finding.
trend_analysis: Number of auth-related findings should trend to zero over time.

test_scenarios: ["MFA Bypass via Recovery Code Flaws","Password Reset Token Hijacking","Race conditions in token invalidation","State management flaws in the two-step login process"]
acceptance_criteria: No logical bypasses of the MFA or password reset flows are possible.
reporting_requirements: Detailed report of logical flaws and recommended fixes.
